mapper.insert: insert into t_user ( id, user_name, login_name, password, avatar, user_type, email_code, create_time, phone, email) values ( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_code = #{emailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, login_name, password, avatar, user_type, email,email_code, create_time, phone from t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_name, login_name, password, avatar, user_type, email,emailCode, create_time, phone from t_user
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_user
password=#{password},
user_name=#{userName},
avatar=#{avatar},
phone=#{phone},
email=#{email},
email_code=#{emailCode},
where id=#{id}
